--- title: Welcome to czapi keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A basic API for scraping curling boxscores off of the popular CurlingZone website. " description: "A basic API for scraping curling boxscores off of the popular CurlingZone website. " nb_path: "nbs\index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install 

pip install czapi

How to use

{% raw %} 
import czapi.api as api
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
linescore_page = api.LinescorePage(cz_event_id = 5000, cz_draw_id = 1)

linescore_page.boxscores

About czapi

czapi is a Python library for scraping curling linescores.
